job_purpose: Enabling digital asset management capabilities in the mining industry
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Maintenance roles involving fixed plant equipment (e.g. conveyor belts, screen houses, crushers)
Connecting key datasets related to asset health (e.g. notifications, work orders, equipment details, failure records)
Conducting equipment failure investigations to determine root causes
required_qualifications: Practical experience in maintenance roles with fixed plant equipment
Understanding of asset health datasets and data connections
Strong knowledge of reliability engineering concepts
company_details: Meaningful work in enabling the future of digital asset management in mining. Collaborate with industry leaders and technical specialists. Be part of a supportive, innovative team driving operational improvements through data.
